PetAbility Shoot Attack
Shoots at any close-range enemies and deals heavy damage.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power and frequency.
PetAbility Shoot Attack
Shoots at any mid-range enemies and deals medium damage.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power and frequency.
PetAbility Shoot Attack
Shoots at any nearby far-range enemies and deals light damage.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power and frequency.
PetAbility AOE Attack
Zaps any enemy foolish enough to touch your pet. This attack has a chance of paralyzing your foes.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power, range, chance of paralyzing, and duration of paralyze effect.
PetAbility Heal
Heals you periodically.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power and frequency.
PetAbility Magic Heal
Restores your Magic Points periodically.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its power and frequency.
PetAbility Savage
Your pet will run towards nearby enemies.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its frequency and range.
PetAbility Decoy
Distracts enemies for a short while.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its range, duration and shorten its cooldown time.
PetAbility RisingFury
Standing still will charge this attack. Begin moving to release a blast of fury that hurts nearby enemies.\n\nLevel this ability up to increase its damage and range + decrease its charge time and cooldown.
